name: BLADE (itch)
description:
You're the last humanoid robot.  Elminate the androids as many as you can.

You can only take 2 hit damage.

WASD MOUSE - movement

LMB - Slash

RMB - Dodge

SPACE - JUMP

SHIFT - Sprint

R - Restart

SCREEN SHOTS

BOSS FIGHT

(can't be defeated yet)

It's a school project.

work with 4 classmates, took us a mouth.
